title: Use Xbox Controller As A Switch Pro Gamepad With The RetroFlag SuperPack! Hands On
description:
In this video we test out the all new RetroFlag Xbox Series Controller SuperPack! And this is one of the best Xbox Controller accessories we’ve ever tested. The Superpack allows you to use an Xbox controller with your Nintendo switch! It supports motion controls, Macro, Turbo and it adds a Rechargeable battery. It also turns your Xbox controller into an Elite Controller for PC, Android and IOS.

Buy The RetroFlag Superpack Here:https://amzn.to/3JOmlxk
